title: DeSantis-appointed judge signals Florida's congressional map is unconstitutional for diminishing Black representation - CNN
content:
1. DeSantis-appointed judge signals Florida's congressional map is unconstitutional for diminishing Black representation  CNN
  2. Judge strikes down Florida governor’s ‘unconstitutional’ election map  The Guardian US
  3. DeSantis' redistricting map blocked by judge  WESH 2 Orlando
  4. Judge finds Florida's Republican-backed congressional map illegally harms Black voters  Reuters.com
  5. Florida judge strikes down part of DeSantis House map  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A Florida circuit court judge signaled Wednesday that a new congressional map championed by Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis is likely unconstitutional, siding with Democrats and voting rights groups who said the map would illegally suppress Black voters in northern Florida.
